item.title: A CLI Reminder - Remind
item.description: I’ve struggled with remembering appointments and tasks for a long time. During my undergraduate courses, I learned to manage the tasks I had because they were few and regular. It’s easy to remember you have class at 7h30 if every weekday you have class at 7h30. Also, you normally have a group of people around you doing the same things, so someone usually remembers when something is due. As years advanced, I started using what I could to remeber tasks.
